events.description: Participate in the celebrations of Hanuman Jayanti, commemorating the birth of Lord Hanuman.

events.description: Join the grand procession to celebrate the birth of Lord Rama in Ayodhya.

events.description: Experience the rich art and culture of Ayodhya through exhibitions, performances, and workshops.
Celebrate the festival of lights with joy and enthusiasm in Ayodhya.
